title: Topic 001 Question 065
body: You need to define Service Level Objectives (SLOs) for a high-traffic multi-region web application. Customers expect the application to always be available and have fast response times. Customers are currently happy with the application performance and availability. Based on current measurement, you observe that the
percentile of latency is 120ms and the 95
percentile of latency is 275ms over a 28-day window. What latency SLO would you recommend to the team to th th publish?
options: 90 percentile ג€" 100ms th 95 percentile ג€" 250ms th
90 percentile ג€" 120ms th 95 percentile ג€" 275ms th
90 percentile ג€" 150ms th 95 percentile ג€" 300ms th
90 percentile ג€" 250ms th 95 percentile ג€" 400ms th
